title: Royal visit to Melbourne 1963 [Work print]
creator_credit: H. Rodney Power, David Swift and State Film Centre of Victoria
brief_description: Work print footage of the royal visit in 1963. Includes aerial views of Melbourne, the arrival of the royal yacht, The Queen and Price Phillip being greeted by dignitaries, the inspection of troops, passing crowds in a Rolls Royce, the arrival at a racetrack and a reception at the Melbourne Town Hall
